    Class Description
    BingRulesManager
    Object that gets and processes bing rules from the server.
    ContentManager
    Class for accessing content from the current session.
    ContentUtils
    Static content utility methods.
    EventDisplay
    Class helper to stringify an event
    EventUtils
    Utility methods for events.
    ImageUtils  
    JsonUtils
    Static methods for converting json into objects.
    JsonUtils.MatrixFieldNamingStrategy
    Based on FieldNamingPolicy.LOWER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES.
    Log
    Intended to mimic Log in terms of interface, but with a lot of extra behind the scenes stuff.
    Log.LogFormatter  
    MXOsHandler
    Override the os handler to support unitary tests
    ResourceUtils
    Static resource utility methods.
    ResourceUtils.Resource  
    UnsentEventsManager
    unsent matrix events manager This manager schedules the unsent events sending.
